attributes.action: retain personal property of rioters to the value they stole
attributes.additional_details:
It is my belief that these 'hoodies' and thieves should be made to lose their own personal property to the value of the items they looted.
I feel it would make them think of the consequences of their actions if the same thing happened to them.
Give the courts and police the right to enter the looters / or looters family and take their possesions; and see how they like a taste of their own medicine?
